modules.description: This module provides the default authentication provider configurations, which can be extended to create new authentication providers and functions to interact with the "auth:InvocationContext".

classes.description: Represents the client Basic Auth provider.

Represents the configuration file based listener Basic Auth provider, which is an implementation of the
`auth:ListenerBasicAuthProvider` object.
Represents the LDAP based listener Basic Auth provider.

functions.description: Extracts the username and the password from the base64-encoded `username:password` value.

records.description: Represents credentials for Basic Auth authentication.
Represents the file user store configurations.
Represents the configurations that are required for an LDAP user store.
Configures the SSL/TLS options to be used for LDAP communication.
Represents the details of the authenticated user.

constants.description: Prefix used to denote special configuration values.
Prefix used to denote that the config value is a SHA-256 hash.
Prefix used to denote that the config value is a SHA-384 hash.
Prefix used to denote that the config value is a SHA-512 hash.
Default charset to be used with password hashing.

errors.description: Represents the Auth module related error.

abstractObjects.description: Represents the listener Basic Auth provider, which could be used to authenticate credentials.
